entry.title: AA Use Phone Animations Package
entry.content:
This asset is composed of various 39 high-quality motion capture animations needed for game development.

Animation Clips consist of all looping animation Mecanim compatible.

Also, all motion is humanoid based.

We have a professional motion capture team. Our database has thousands of animations.

We are pleased to share with you our motion capture work. Please look forward to more work from us. Please stay tuned!

entry.title: AA Use Phone Animations Package
entry.content:
该资产由39个高质量的动作捕捉动画组成，适用于游戏开发。

动画片段包含所有循环动画，兼容Mecanim。

此外，所有动作均基于类人模型。

我们拥有一支专业的动作捕捉团队。我们的数据库中有成千上万的动画。

我们很高兴与您分享我们的动作捕捉作品。请期待我们更多的作品。敬请关注！
